short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for converting / saving  website or computer images to AVIF, WEBP JPEG, PNG, PDF

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension to convert web or computer images  to multiple formats including  avif, webp, jpeg, png and pdf. The simple and minmal user-interface makes using this extension less confusing and straight forward. 
AVIF is a new image format that helps to reduce the file size while maintaining the image quality. Any image Converter is a perfect tool to save your web images as avif format.
